mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into fund(code,name,ft,date,l1y,l2y,l3y,ty,cy) values
( #{fundPo.code}, #{fundPo.name}, #{fundPo.ft},#{fundPo.date},#{fundPo.l1y}, #{fundPo.l2y}, #{fundPo.l3y},#{fundPo.ty},#{fundPo.cy} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name), ft=VALUES(ft), date=VALUES(date), l1y=VALUES(l1y), l2y=VALUES(l2y), l3y=VALUES(l3y), ty=VALUES(ty), cy=VALUES(cy)
mapper.delete: delete from fund where name is null or name=''
mapper.select: select * from fund where ft=#{ft} and level>=#{level}
